DRAFT
A PROPOSAL FOR EDUCATIONAL RADIO PROGRAM PRODUCTION AND
DUPLICATION (Phase B) AT THE NATIONAL AUDIO CENTER
This proposal encompasses the period
from July 1, 1969-June 30, 1972
Obj ecfives
Provide impetus and capability to a long established, growing
nationwide educational radio program service. Provide a quality
production and duplication facility for the National Edu¬
cational Radio Network.
Provide new programs that help identify, clarify and arti¬
culate important issues of our time.
Stimulate the availability of programs for production and
duplication through fresh and long-awaited new approaches to
educational radio.
